title: Holywell: Motorcyclist dies following crash with car
article: A motorcyclist has died following a crash in north Wales. North Wales Police said the two-vehicle crash happened on Halkyn Road in Holywell, Flintshire, at about 05:50 GMT on Thursday. The 41-year-old motorcyclist was pronounced dead at the scene of the crash, which involved the motorcycle and a silver Vauxhall Vectra. Police have closed the road and appealed for any witnesses of the collision to contact the force.
